definition: Abe (short form for Abraham)/Abel, a figure of Jewish, Christian and Muslim mythologies
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛

sentences.english: Even as Abraham believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 正如，亞伯拉罕信神，這就算爲他的義。

sentences.english: In place of Isaac, God provided a ram for Abraham to sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 神爲亞伯拉罕預備了獻祭的公羊，代替以撒。

sentences.english: An Egyptian slave given to Abraham by the Pharaoh of Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 埃及的法老給了亞伯拉罕一個僕婢。

sentences.english: “The first was just a warning, ” Abrahim said.
sentences.chinese: “剛纔第一次不過是警告，”亞伯拉罕說。

sentences.english: "O Lord, God of my master, Abraham," he prayed.
sentences.chinese: “耶和華我主人亞伯拉罕的神阿，”他禱告說。

sentences.english: I also. The seed of Abraham are they?
sentences.chinese: 我也是。他們是亞伯拉罕的後裔麼？

sentences.english: Albert enjoys privacy and he tends to do things on the sly.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯特注重隱私，做事總是很神祕。

sentences.english: Then the king promoted Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego, in the province of Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 那時王在巴比倫省，高升了沙得拉，米煞，亞伯尼歌。

sentences.english: Abrahim and my father stopped going to the port at night.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯拉罕和我父親晚上不再去港口了。

sentences.english: When Abraham's servant heard what they said, he bowed down to the ground before the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯拉罕的僕人聽見他們這話，就向耶和華俯伏在地。

sentences.english: What have you learned from Abraham's first detour down to Egypt?
sentences.chinese: 亞伯拉罕第一次下埃及的經驗給你何啓示？

sentences.english: Ah, you see, Abraham knew about it… but he did.
sentences.chinese: 不錯，亞伯拉罕早知道這件事了，但是他沒。

sentences.english: Abram was seventy-five years old when he set out from Haran.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯蘭出哈蘭的時候年七十五歲。

sentences.english: In the Old Testament, the son of Abraham who was cast out after the birth of Isaac.
sentences.chinese: 以實瑪利舊約中亞伯拉罕之子，在以撒出生後被棄。

sentences.english: Abraham set apart seven ewe lambs from the flock.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯拉罕把七支母羊羔另放在一處。

sentences.english: Abraham makes his servant put his hand under his thigh while swearing to God.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯拉罕讓他的僕人把手放在他的大腿下向上帝發誓。
